snippet.title: SpellForce: Heroes and Magic Trailer
snippet.description:
Craft your fantasy empire in this turn-based strategy game!

Time for a new turn on the critically acclaimed SpellForce-Series. The epic fantasy saga is now available on mobile, offering a whole new angle to the franchise. 

● CRAFT YOUR FANTASY EMPIRE
● EXPLORE NEW LANDS
● BATTLE YOUR ENEMIES
● EVOLVE YOUR SOLDIERS

Download now!
Google Play: http://bit.ly/SpellForce
AppStore: http://bit.ly/SpellForceHM

Published by HandyGames
Developed by Hex Games
Music by Christophe Kalkau

#HandyGames #SpellForceHM #SFHM #HexGames #Android #iOS #SpellForce

http://www.handy-games.com. ▶

Join us on Facebook: http://www.fb.com/handygames
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/handygames
Check news on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/handy_games
Subscribe to our YouTube channel: http://goo.gl/2Kq6yY
